testcase.classname: Ability to Edit Advertiser Account settings
testcase.name: 01 Check if Advertiser Accounts tab opened correctly
testcase.system-out: Given I am a Proteus User...................................................passed And I have the role: Pro Web Advertiser_Manager_Editor......................passed And I go to the Proteus Home URL in my browser..............................passed When Login as "ADMINISTRATOR"...............................................passed Then The main homepage loads successfully...................................passed When I click on "Administration" from home page.............................passed Then Administration page shown correctly....................................passed Then Able to navigate to Administration Advertiser Accounts.................passed And LogOut ProteusWeb from Reports Page.....................................passed

testcase.classname: Ability to Edit Advertiser Account settings
testcase.name: 02 Access and View Advertiser Account Overview
testcase.system-out: Given I am a Proteus User...................................................passed And I have the role: Pro Web Advertiser_Manager_Editor......................passed And I go to the Proteus Home URL in my browser..............................passed When Login as "ADMINISTRATOR"...............................................passed Then The main homepage loads successfully...................................passed When I click on "Administration" from home page.............................passed Then Administration page shown correctly....................................passed Then Able to navigate to Administration Advertiser Accounts.................passed When I select a First Advertiser Account....................................passed Then Advertiser Account Overview screen shown...............................passed And LogOut ProteusWeb from Admin Page.......................................passed

testcase.classname: Ability to Edit Advertiser Account settings
testcase.name: 03 Able to search for Advertiser Account
testcase.system-out: Given I am a Proteus User...................................................passed And I have the role: Pro Web Advertiser_Manager_Editor......................passed And I go to the Proteus Home URL in my browser..............................passed When Login as "ADMINISTRATOR"...............................................passed Then The main homepage loads successfully...................................passed When I click on "Administration" from home page.............................passed Then Administration page shown correctly....................................passed Then Able to navigate to Administration Advertiser Accounts.................passed When Search for an Advertiser to EditName...................................passed Then Advertisers filtered as per search key "AdvertiserNameBeforeEdit"......passed

testcase.classname: Ability to Edit Advertiser Account settings
testcase.name: 04 Able to see Advertiser Account Overview screen information
testcase.system-out: Given I am a Proteus User...................................................passed And I have the role: Pro Web Advertiser_Manager_Editor......................passed And I go to the Proteus Home URL in my browser..............................passed When Login as "ADMINISTRATOR"...............................................passed Then The main homepage loads successfully...................................passed When I click on "Administration" from home page.............................passed Then Administration page shown correctly....................................passed Then Able to navigate to Administration Advertiser Accounts.................passed When Search for an Advertiser to EditName...................................passed Then Advertisers filtered as per search key "AdvertiserNameBeforeEdit"......passed When I select a First Advertiser Account....................................passed Then Advertiser Account details displayed on the page.......................passed And LogOut ProteusWeb from Admin Page.......................................passed

testcase.classname: Ability to Edit Advertiser Account settings
testcase.name: 05 Able to edit Advertiser Account details
testcase.system-out: Given I am a Proteus User...................................................passed And I have the role: Pro Web Advertiser_Manager_Editor......................passed And I go to the Proteus Home URL in my browser..............................passed When Login as "ADMINISTRATOR"...............................................passed Then The main homepage loads successfully...................................passed When I click on "Administration" from home page.............................passed Then Administration page shown correctly....................................passed Then Able to navigate to Administration Advertiser Accounts.................passed When Search for an Advertiser to EditName...................................passed When I select a First Advertiser Account....................................passed When Click on edit icon to change advertiser information....................passed And Update Advertiser, Agency Name and save the details.....................passed When Search for Advertiser before edit name.................................passed Then No Advertisers returned................................................passed When Search for Advertiser with updated name................................passed Then Advertisers filtered as per search key "AdvertiserNameAfterEdit".......passed And LogOut ProteusWeb from Admin Page.......................................passed

testcase.classname: Ability to Edit Advertiser Account settings
testcase.name: 06 Option to Merge advertiser account into another
